q: what happens when people in video put the apple in the juicer
pred: In the video, a person is seen putting an apple into a juicer and then pouring the juice into a glass. The person then adds a lemon slice to the glass and pours the juice over it. The person then adds a lemon wedge to the glass and pours the juice over it. Finally, the person adds ice to the glass and pours the juice over it. The person then hands the glass to another person, who drinks the juice.
